name: package-conflicts-resolver
description: A Node.js CLI tool that automatically resolves conflicts in package.json and package-lock.json files

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
scripts.publish:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m "beta version - %s" && npm publish --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch -m "patch version - %s" && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor -m "minor version - %s" && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:major: npm version major -m "major version - %s" && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
